articles.title: ‘It gave us some way to fight back’: New tools aim to protect art and images from AI’s grasp - CNN
articles.description: For months, Eveline Fröhlich, a visual artist based in Stuttgart, Germany, has been feeling “helpless” as she watched the rise of new artificial intelligence tools that threaten to put human artists out of work.
